code: /*告訴使用者現在時間是工作天還是放假天 *//* 練習創建 加入條件式，讓系統判斷要渲染哪個元件*/import{useDayContext}from'./DayProvider';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CurrentMessage(){const{day}=useDayContext();const workdays=day>=1&&day<=5;const weekends=day===0||day===6;if(workdays){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkDays,{day:day});}else if(weekends){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Weekends,{day:day});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{day:day});}}function WorkDays(props){switch(props.day){case 1:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u75DB\u82E6\u661F\u671F\u4E00 QQ"});case 2:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u714E\u71AC\u661F\u671F\u4E8C @@"});case 3:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u7121\u8A9E\u661F\u671F\u4E09 O\u53E3O"});case 4:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u5E0C\u671B\u661F\u671F\u56DB +.+"});case 5:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u5FEB\u6A02\u661F\u671F\u4E94 ^\u53E3^"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u9019\u5565?!"});}}function Weekends(props){if(props.day===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u628A\u63E1\u6700\u5F8C\u6642\u5149QQ"});}else if(props.day===6){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Happy!~Happy!~"});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"WTF?"});}}function ErrorMessage(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"ErrorMessage",children:["\u8CC7\u6599\u6709\u8AA4! \u8CC7\u6599:",props.day]});}export default CurrentMessage;
